game.name: Kanji Grinder
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Kanji Grinder is a spaced repetition flashcard system, purpose-built for Steam Deck. Designed for immersion learners who want a no-nonsense way to drill Kanji vocabulary, your daily reviews will be a breeze. Plus, for those who enjoy quiz games or flexing their skills, plenty of challenges await!
